column1: #text=I wanted to spend the evening at the theater on Friday .
#text=There was a good play on in town and I decided to take the bus .
#text=at 6:30 PM , I walked to the bus stop near my house .
#text=It was a ten-minute walk in nice weather .
#text=At the bus stop , I waited only two minutes before the bus arrived .
#text=I stepped onto the public bus and paid for a one-way ticket .
#text=The trip into town took fifteen minutes because the bus had other stops to make in the area before returning to the station .
#text=I saw someone I knew on the bus and we spent most of the travel time talking .
#text=The driver slowed down , and maneuvered the bus into its numbered space .
#text=The doors opened and the passengers began to exit , moving together smoothly at a leisurely pace .
#text=I got off the bus and went to the theater .
